Posts.Content: I had my mammogram today and they also did an ultra sound because the mammogram showed something in my right breast that I didn't even know was there. They are going to give me the results on Friday. So that's the latest. I'll let you all know the results. Thank you for caring!......Dawn
Posts.Title: Lump in breast for three years

Posts.Content:
I was just wondering about
 a lump I have had for a little over three years. It started deep in my left breast and now is larger and has moved up closer to the surface. I have no insurance so have avoided going to the doctor. Any advice?
Posts.Title: Lump in breast for three years

Posts.Content: They didn't call me on Friday and I guess that's a good thing. I was suppose to call them if they didn't call me.....I was too scared to call them....but I'm thinking it's probably a good thing? I'll call on Monday. Live in a tiny community they do things just a little different. ....that's the latest..........Dawn
Posts.Title: Lump in breast for three years

Posts.Content:
Thank you everyone for taking the time to comment. I have my appointment made. Hopefully it is just a cyst?! Moves around a lot which is why I have never really thought much about
 it....then I found out some cancers can move around.....UGH!.......Dawn
Posts.Title: Lump in breast for three years
Lump in breast for three years

Posts.Content: My test came back normal. Thank you everyone!
